Author: adustydragon123
Text: Yeah this is a lot smarter :) I weigh things like pasta and grains but I guess I got used to just doing 1 calorie per pea just because it felt faster.

Author: stopandbelieve
Text: I used to weigh my food, I felt like it was more accurate than measuring cups (the spaces between the food!!) and it seems like this might be less time consuming than counting out individual peas?
